table_caption: FA, MD, RD. and DA whole-brain values (mean±SD), for all participants
table_foot: HC, healthy controls; AD, patients with Alzheimer’s disease; SD, standard deviation; FA, fractional anisotropy; MD, mean diffusivity; RD, radial diffusivity; DA, axial diffusivity.*p-values <0.05 were considered statistically significant (corrected for multiple comparisons by using post-hoc Bonferroni correction for the number of metrics considered).
